search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Smiirl (smiirl.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Smiirl is available at: [https://www.smiirl.com/shop](https://www.smiirl.com/shop)【3:1†source】.

We use a few cookies to improve your visit and show you the right content. Is that OK with you?

To modify your preferences afterwards, click on the 'Cookie Preferences' link located in the page footer.

[Read our privacy policy](https://www.smiirl.com/en/privacy-policy)

[Cookie statement](https://www.smiirl.com/en/privacy-policy)

*   [Here are our cookies!](https://www.smiirl.com/shop#Here%20are%20our%20cookies!)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: No pricing information was available in the provided content.

Surprisingly powerful communication tools for your business.
============================================================

Our Instagram, TikTok & Facebook Counters display your business’ follower count in real-time. Watching the split-flaps in action is pure magic, thus creating an interaction around your social media with a power you never thought possible.

[Discover Social Media Counters](https://www.smiirl.com/en/counter/category/social)

 Your browser does not support the video tag.

Our Instagram, TikTok & Facebook Counters display your business’ follower count in real-time. Watching the split-flaps in action is pure magic, thus creating an interaction around your social media with a power you never thought possible.

[Discover Social Media Counters](https://www.smiirl.com/en/counter/category/social)

Unleash the incredible power of your company's figures.
=======================================================

Give your data a physical presence like never before, by displaying it in real-time with a Custom Counter. Then observe with awe the motivational impact it has on your team and yourself!

[Discover Custom Counters](https://www.smiirl.com/en/counter/category/custom)

 Your browser does not support the video tag.

Give your data a physical presence like never before, by displaying it in real-time with a Custom Counter. Then observe with awe the motivational impact it has on your team and yourself!

[Discover Custom Counters](https://www.smiirl.com/en/counter/category/custom)

#### 100-day risk-free trial

On Social Counters – Either delighted or refunded!

#### Customer support 5/7 days

100% secured payments - 2-year warranty

#### 3-day super fast delivery

Worldwide air shipping

Join Over 37,000 Businesses Growing Faster Online
-------------------------------------------------

![Image 8: generic testimonials ig the sourdough libarian](https://smiirl.twic.pics/v1/resize=2p/image:media/img/generic/testimonials/ig/the-sourdough-libarian.png)

> Love the instant awareness that the counter provides - the counter itself generates more followers as they want to see it move! It is a great way to start a conversation.

**The Sourdough Librarian - Belgium**  
@the\_sourdough\_librarian

![Image 9: generic testimonials ig barber chope](https://smiirl.twic.pics/v1/resize=2p/image:media/img/generic/testimonials/ig/barber-chope.jpg)

> The Counters feel right at home in our bar and barber shop. Thanks to Smiirl we managed to communicate and keep growing our Social Media, even during lockdown!

**Barber Chope - France**  
@barberchope

![Image 10: generic testimonials ig peak health performance.jpeg](https://smiirl.twic.pics/v1/resize=2p/image:media/img/generic/testimonials/ig/peak-health-performance.jpeg)

> Our team loves the Instagram Counter! It's a great way to welcome our patients and advertise our Instagram account.

**Peak Health & Performance - Canada**  
@peakhealthcalgary

![Image 11: generic testimonials ig thistle stitch](https://smiirl.twic.pics/v1/resize=2p/image:media/img/generic/testimonials/ig/thistle-stitch.jpg)

> Treated my business to this awesome IG Counter! This thing is pretty cool and I'm so excited to take it with us to events to help gain followers.

**Thistle & Stitch - California, USA**  
@thistle.and.stitch

![Image 12: generic testimonials fb hubsy](https://smiirl.twic.pics/v1/resize=2p/image:media/img/generic/testimonials/fb/hubsy.jpg)

**Hubsy Café - France**  
@hubsycafe

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Smiirl offers a 100-day risk-free trial for their Social Counters. A 10% discount is available for first-time purchases upon email subscription.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Get a 10% discount on your first Smiirl Counter purchase by subscribing with your email.
